original_title: 暴風雨 上司の奥さんと二人だけの夜 佐山愛
overview: I had a secret feeling for Ai, the wife of my respected boss. The more I felt bad for her boss, the more my feelings grew. Even on this day, when the typhoon hit directly, I was asked to go to her boss's house to pick up the materials, and I was thrilled to meet Ai. Then, in front of the entrance, I ran into Ai-san on her way home from shopping. Her umbrella was broken and her hair was soaking wet, and I was fascinated by her underwear that was slightly transparent from her white T-shirt, and I couldn't control her desire.
title: A Thunderous Rainstorm A Night Alone With The Boss’s Wife – Ai Sayama
